CREATE_TABLE: CREATE TABLE tools (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, name TEXT, description TEXT, url TEXT, createdAt DATETIME, updatedAt DATETIME)
INSERT_TOOL: INSERT INTO tools (name, description, url, createdAt, updatedAt) VALUES ($name, $description, $url, $createdAt, $updatedAt)
UPDATE_TOOL: UPDATE tools SET name = $name, description = $description, url = $url, updatedAt = $updatedAt WHERE id = $id

SEED_TOOLS.$description: Bun is a fast, modern, all-in-one toolkit for JavaScript.
Pico CSS is a minimal CSS framework for semantic HTML.
Playwright is a framework for browser automation and testing.
Vite is a build tool for modern web development.
